Dating: 22ND DYNASTY (not before); 25TH DYNASTY AND CONTEMPORARIES (not after)
Name: Canopic jar with lid in the shape of a falcon's head
Description: Canopic jar with lid in the shape of a falcon's head. The vase and lid are completely preserved. The vase has slightly curved walls, which taper towards the base. The rim is straight and separated from the hollow interior by a small ledge on the inside. The exterior surface is carefully smoothened. On the front is a column of black painted hieroglyphs bordered by carved lines.
